title: Areas of Experience
description: I have experience working in cross-functional teams and communicating across departments to support projects of various scales. Having built out applications in both JavaScript and Python, I have a good understanding of the different frameworks and libraries that are available in both languages. I also have experience with data analysis using SQL, R, Excel, Access, Python, and Tableau allowing me to work comfortably with large and small databases and create actionable insights based on the data extracted.

servicesBoxes.servDesc: I have experience working with Excel, SQL, Python, VBA, and Tableau. I have used a variety of Python packages (Seaborn, matplotlib, Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit) and software tools to generate effective visuals and reports.

My experience with databases includes working with SQL across a number of different platforms including PostgreSQL, Access, and MySQL. I have also utilized SQL in big data environments including both customer and medical environments adhering to secure data guidelines to extract important information.

I have experience gathering information and translating goals into a project plan, design, and requirements as well as identifying issues and implementing solutions. My experience in healthcare and leading large teams and implementing changes has given me the ability to work with a variety of stakeholders to ensure that the final results meet the needs of the customer and company.

I'm well acquainted with both Agile, Waterfall, and SCRUM work-flow methodologies. I have experience playing multiple roles across the SCRUM and juggling multiple priorities to ensure that the team is able to deliver on time. I have also worked with a variety of project management tools including Jira and Kanban boards.
